titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4775) making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-484, by Mr. Sessions.

The rule waives all points of order against consideration of the bill and waives points of order against provisions in the bill, except as specified in the rule. The rule provides that the amendments printed in the Rules Committee report shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. Provides that House Concurrent Resolution 353, as adopted by the House, shall have force and effect as though adopted by Congress.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 164.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 428.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 209, 3 Present (Roll no. 194).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/22/2002--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 4775 (FY 2002 supplemental appropriations).
